commitResults.messageTitle: Rename chatbot and update messages
Add user input handling with echo and exit commands
Add command processor and list command
commitResults.messageBody:
Only echos message back to user.

CommandProcessor allows for greater extensibility, allowing us to add more commands in the future to process user inputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add mark and unmark tasks as done commands
Create different task types
commitResults.messageBody:
There can be different Task types.

Making Task type an abstract class and extending from Task class allows us to define a common structure and shared logic while enforcing specific behaviour to be implemented by each concrete task type. This improves code clarity, promotes reusability, and makes it easier to add new task variations without modifying existing ones.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support to handle different Task types
Add automated text UI testing
Introduce error handling and input validation for task commands
Add delete task command
bug fix: Fix removal task description display
commitResults.messageBody: The removed task's description was incorrectly displayed as the next task's description in the list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Text UI Test for delete command
Add Text UI Test for error handling
InputProcessor.java: Refactor commands to use enums
Extract Command enum to its own file
commitResults.messageBody:
Command enum was declared within InputProcessor.java.

By extracting Command into its own separate file, the code becomes more
modular, improving clarity and maintainability.

commitResults.messageTitle: Allow initializing tasks with completion status
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks were always initialized with a default incomplete status.

This change allows tasks (ToDo, Deadline, and Event) to be initialized
with a specified completion status. This improves flexibility for bulk-
loading tasks or restoring task states.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add getter methods for Task, Deadline, and Event classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Getter methods for key attributes were missing.

Adding getter methods improves encapsulation, allowing controlled
access to the attributes. This allows us to get fields to serialize
Tasks in CSV format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add FileUtils class for file operations and update .gitignore
Add TaskSerializer and TaskValidator classes for task processing
refactor(Task)!: Remove task IDs and refactor description methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Task IDs were auto-generated and tightly coupled with the Task class.

This change removes the task ID functionality, simplifying the Task
class. The `toString` method now replaces `getTaskDescription` in all
subclasses, aligning with Java conventions and reducing redundancy.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add TaskList class to manage task collections
Persist tasks to CSV storage and integrate with InputProcessor
commitResults.messageBody:
InputProcessor managed tasks in-memory, leading to loss of data when
the application closed.

This change introduces `CsvTaskStorage`, which handles reading and
writing tasks from a CSV file, ensuring persistence across sessions.
InputProcessor is updated to use this new storage class, removing
responsibility for list management. Additionally, task additions,
deletions, and updates now reflect directly in the CSV file. This
improves data reliability and aligns with long-term storage objectives.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor codebase to organize classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody:
Most classes were located in a flat structure, making navigation
difficult and reducing maintainability.

This change organizes classes into logical packages.

Let's,
* organise files into packages

commitResults.messageTitle: Update text-ui-test to perform full cleanup after tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Text-ui-test leaves residual tasks in the list after execution.

This ensures the test storage is fully cleaned up after execution,
maintaining independence for future tests and improving test
reliability.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Add DateUtils for date parsing and formatting
commitResults.messageBody:
Date handling uses Strings across the codebase.

Lets,
* add date input validation for /from and /to fields in event tasks
* add date input validation for /by field in deadline tasks
* add error handling for date parsing failure

fix: Make Hermione class final
fix: Add assertions for Command and TaskList classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Command and TaskList lacks explicit documentation of important
assumptions about object states, making it harder to catch bugs
early and understand expected behaviour of method.

Let's add assert statements to Command and TaskList to document
preconditions.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Improve CsvTaskStorage implementation and add assertions
refactor: Apply SLAP to InputProcessor
commitResults.messageBody:
The process() method in InputProcessor mixes different levels of
abstraction by handling string parsing, command creation, and exception
handling all within a single method.

Let's extract string parsing and command execution logic into separate
private  methods to improve readability and maintainability.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Replace magic numbers with constants in TaskValidator
refactor: Replace magic strings with constants in TaskSerializer
refactor: Add TaskType enum to replace magic strings for task types
commitResults.messageBody:
Task type codes "T", "D", "E" are hardcoded as string literals across
multiple classes, making the code harder to maintain and error-prone.

Let's replace magic strings with TaskType enum containing TODO, DEADLINE
, and EVENT values.

commitResults.messageTitle: fix: Enhance task type validation in TaskValidator
feat: Enhance ListCommand to display the number of completed tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
ListCommand only shows the list of tasks without providing
any summary information about task completion status. Users have to
manually count completed tasks to understand their progress.

Let's add task completion statistics to the ListCommand output to show
the number of completed and total tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #1 from jovnc/branch-A-Assertions
commitResults.messageBody: Use assertions to document important assumptions

commitResults.messageBody: Refactor to improve the code quality

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #3 from jovnc/branch-A-Streams
commitResults.messageBody: feat: Display number of completed tasks using Streams API

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Improve CSV parsing logic and validation in TaskSerializer
commitResults.messageBody:
TaskSerializer fails to run when parsing CSV with spaces after commas. Validation in TaskSerializer also fails to catch some edge cases, eg. returning empty string instead of throwing an Exception when validating number of fields.

Lets,
* add trim() to deserialize to allow proper parsing of CSV with space after commas
* add proper error handling logic in validation of fields

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Rename TaskSerializer to StorageUtils
ui: Enhance GUI with Harry Potter theme and disable button
feat: Add HelpCommand to give help to users
commitResults.messageBody:
Users do not have any documentation to see what commands are available to use in the chatbot.

Let's,
* add help command to show all available commands to users

commitResults.messageBody: Add HelpCommand to give help to users
